VISA USB VI and Functions

Owning Palette: Bus/Interface Specific Functions

Requires: Base Development System. This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the VISA USB VI and functions to control USB devices.

The VI and functions on this palette can return VISA error codes.

Palette ObjectDescription
VISA Get USB Interrupt DataRetrieves the interrupt data that is stored in a VISA USB interrupt event.
VISA USB Control InPerforms a USB control pipe transfer from a USB device.
VISA USB Control OutPerforms a USB control pipe transfer to the device.
